title: Flute, clarinet and bassoon
brief_description: Introduces three of the woodwind instruments and illustrates the principle by which each produces a musical sound. How a scale is produced by the opening and closing of holes is demonstrated through diagrams and close-ups of each instrument. The instruments are played separately, in pairs and as a trio.
